segments.text: I notice the boy is really stretching to reach those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He seems determined to get what he wants, no matter the risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the girl is being patient, waiting for her turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying dishes, completely unaware of the water overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit frustrated that she hasn't noticed the mess yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring over the edge of the sink, and she's standing right there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the children planned this little cookie heist while she was distracted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable; I hope the boy doesn't fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the cookies in the jar, and they look tempting, even from here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's face is so expectant, like she's been waiting for this moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman might be in for a surprise when she turns around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen seems so ordinary, but there's so much happening.
segments.speaker: PAR
